title._content: Image taken from page 10 of 'From London to Lucknow: with memoranda of mutinies, marches, flights, fights and conversations. To which is added an Opium-Smuggler's explanation of the Peiho Massacre.-By a Chaplain in H. M. Indian Service [J. Mackay afterwar

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "From London to Lucknow: with memoranda of mutinies, marches, flights, fights and conversations. To which is added an Opium-Smuggler's explanation of the Peiho Massacre.-By a Chaplain in H. M. Indian Service [J. Mackay afterwards Aberigh-Mackay]", "Appendix. Miscellaneous" Contributor: MACKAY, afterwards ABERIGH-MACKAY, James. Author: London Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10055.bb.31.", "British Library OC T 36166" Volume: 01 Page: 10 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1860 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002251421 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
